item.title: Trump says Comey called for 'assassination of the president' with '8647' Instagram post
item.description: There is a long history of bad blood between President Trump and James Comey, who Trump fired as FBI director in 2017.

item.title: Qatari cybertrucks, elite camels and trillion-dollar vows: Why Gulf countries are going all out for Trump's visit
item.description: "We appreciate those camels," Trump told the Qatari emir. "I haven't seen camels like that in a long time."

item.title: China calls U.S. trade talks 'good' but quiet on next steps, as Trump hints at Xi call
item.description: Trump has touted earlier this week that he might speak to Chinese leader Xi at the end of this week, while Beijing appeared tight-lipped on that prosp...

item.title: China keeps hold on rare earth metals after lifting some U.S. export curbs
item.description: China's lifting of export controls on 28 U.S. firms was part of a preliminary 90-day tariff pause.

item.title: Bitcoin RICO: Feds say $265 million crypto theft ring blew $13M on exotic cars, nightclubs
item.description: One defendant allegedly sent shipments of $25,000 in laundered currency hidden in squishmallow stuffed animals around the United States.
